== Main Inclusion Report for `libapt-front` ==

# ''Availability:'' Libapt-front is in universe, Arch: any
# ''Rationale:'' Build-dep for Adept and Debtags (static library)
# ''Security:'' 
** No CANs
 0. ''Quality assurance:''  
** Very active maintainer and packager
** No open bug reports 
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** The package meets the FHS.
** Does not meet library guide: 
** no shared library, only a huge static one; this is a pain for bug fixes and security updates
** no SONAME, thus can break API at will and render packages FTBFS
